location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the new Persian coinage and sending 120 pieces of the coinage for examination. The letter also reports that the Rupee is still the principal coin at Bushire but that the mint at Shiraz is busy producing the new coins which they intend to supercede the Rupee throughout the Kingdom of Persia.
